Text: Anne HicksLONECT is out of the officewill be out of the office from until I will respond to your message when I return

Re Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption ApplicationsThis response was not from me it was from Ann Hicks in Houston who is the unfortunate person who receives a large number of mails destined for me because the sender is careless when sending their message Many Thanks Ann From Tana Jones on CDT To Anne CT cc Subject Re Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Applications Anne You didnt write any message on your response so I am not sure if you have a futures trading account or not Is that why you responded to Marks email Mark Taylor PM To Tana CT cc Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Application s Forwarded by Mark TaylorHOUECT on PM Ann NRON AM To Anne CT cc Mark CT Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Application s Forwarded by Ann HicksNAEnron on AM Mark Taylor Sent by Enron Announcements PM To All Enron Houston EveryoneinECTCalgary EveryoneinECTLond on EveryoneinECTPortland EveryoneinECTNew York EveryoneinECTDenver EveryoneinECTOslo EveryoneinECTSingapore EIAustralia Buenos Aires Argentina Office Staff Buenos Aires Argentina TGS Office Staff Enron EveryoneEOGDenver Enron EveryoneEOGCalgary cc Subject Enron North America Corp NYMEX Hedge Exemption Application s We are in the process of preparing applications for position limit exemptio ns for ENAs NYMEX energy commodities futures trading These applications require that ENA represent whether its officers employees owners or agen ts have a power of attorney control or have a financial interest in any other related commodity futures account either individually or acting with another person pursuant to express or implied agreement Please direct any responses to my paralegal Tana Jones via intercompany email or call her at by the end of business Friday June if you have any power of attorney control or have a financial interes t in any commodity futures account other than an ENA or other trading affiliate account IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A COMMODITY FUTURES ACCOUNT YOU DO NOT NEED TO RESPOND TO THIS REQUEST

Re MG Settlement Cc Who will advise the value of the settlement and the full settlement instructions Is there a CACSDASH signed to authorise the flow of funds Many Thanks Ann From Sheila Glover To Sara CT Anne CT cc Trena CT Subject MG Settlement Sara and Ann I have spoken with Morgan Stanley regarding opening up an account for Enron Investments PLC which is a UK based company and will receive UK shares on Settlement date Tuesday We would like to have DVP delivery at Morgan on Therefore we will need to fund the Morgan Stanley account with GBP on for the settlement balance Please call if questions Thanks Sheila Sara Ketan said that you can call Sheung to assist in getting the Morgan Stanley account set up
